paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;

paragraphs.content: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;

paragraphs.content: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.

paragraphs.content: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.

paragraphs.content: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the LORD fulfil all thy petitions.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the Lord fulfil all thy petitions.

paragraphs.content: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now know I that the Lord saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.

paragraphs.content: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the Lord our God.

paragraphs.content: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.

paragraphs.content: Save, LORD: let the king hear us when we call.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Save, Lord: let the king hear us when we call.
